dict.acceptation: 平静地；静止地；轻声地；在暗中；

sent.orig: We are all sitting quietly all quietly sitting.
First, mine sounded stuffy father-in-law of the drum of a winter, rain down quietly and quietly.
sent.trans: 先是雷公公敲响闷了一冬的大鼓，细雨无声地悄然而落。

sent.orig: Please leave quietly – quietly being the operative word.
sent.trans: 请悄悄地离开－“悄悄地”是最重要的。

sent.orig: "You can talk for five minutes," the guard said quietly."The next guard arrives at 12.15."
sent.trans: “你们可以谈五分钟，”那个卫兵悄悄说，“下一班卫兵十二点一刻来。”

sent.orig: But the old man quietly faced the menacing populace.
sent.trans: 只见老人面对着杀气腾腾的群众，神色从容。
